column3: X was upset about having to complete math at the end of the day. He attempted to throw a chair at another student. Escorted to TO and stayed until dismissal. Escort TO

Student was upset at another student. He attempted to kick the student and then picked up a rock and threw it at a car. Walked into TO and stayed until calm. Rock left mark on car window-security was called and person contacted. TO
X X X X T/O- physical intervention- eloped from PE
column4: ran in the hall and became physical with staff. Support escorted to TO room. She became physical and spit on support staff. continued to be physical with support staff while in TO room. then went to rocking chairs in Fish Bowl area.

column4: ran in the hall and became physical with staff. Support escorted to TO room. She became physical and spit on support staff. continued to be physical with support staff while in TO room. then went to rocking chairs in Fish Bowl area.

column3: X X X became upset in the nurse's office because she wanted to go home. She eloped outside and off school property to the street. Staff guided her to the sidewalk and she became physically aggressive (hitting
column4: kicking spitting). Staff escorted her into the building and into the T/O room. She continued to be very physically aggressive. Staff utilized a 3 person supine to keep everyone safe. Staff let go and gave space to calm down. She took her PRN and continued to calm. transferred to an alternate location with a TA to finish her day.
